title: The Mobility Myth
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, we discuss whether or not upward mobility is an illusion. Can you really ever “make it” in a system not designed for you? In a system that rewards your ability to assimilate and comply. Playing the game. Selling out. Respectability politics. Survivor’s Guilt. We share our perspectives and experiences. 

Black Business of the Week - https://talleyandtwine.com
